title: Catalyst Trap
desc:
Post 1250
- Can be played on any of the possible colors of this card except the one it is. (e.g. a red trap can only be played on black brown or gray)
- The first person to play a card the same color as this card activates the trap.
- Unless changed, the trap makes the one who activates it draw two cards.
- Does not show up as being played.
